entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 70 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023
